name: Colorize (itch) (omidfth)
description:
Game Name: Colorize

 

Genre: 2D platformer

Similar game: Cleste

 

Story: A little princess is lost in a forest that is strangely colorless. He realizes that by capturing the magical powers of the forest creatures, he can find his way home and revitalize the forest.

 

 

Game mechanics:

 

• Jump: A single character jump that comes with four guided directions

Double Jump: Two consecutive jumps in the style of similar games

• Dash: Move fast forward in a certain direction

• Grab & Wall Jump: Grab the wall and jump from it and grab it again

Coloring: The character gives the same color to the environment while moving, according to the Super Power taken. Eventually, taking all the powers, the whole path will be colored.

 

Win conditions: The princess must paint the entire screen or part of the game. At the end of each stage, he must acquire the magic diamond so that he can pass through the door of each stage.

 

Loss condition: Collision with blades infected with poisonous fungus, falling into a thinner lagoon

 

Controls:

Main directions for controlling the direction of the character

Z, x, c to use the indicated powers
